content.question: The writer wants to improve the coherence of the first paragraph by adding a transitional sentence between sentences 2 and 3. Which of the following choices most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: The European continent has a rich archaeological history.
Actually, human prehistory— the long stretch of time before written records were kept—is also very important to the discipline.
Nonetheless, skeletal remains figure prominently among the artifacts archaeologists study.
However, insights from the present inform the discipline in many ways.

content.answer: However, insights from the present inform the discipline in many ways.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Use transitional elements to guide the reader through the line of reasoning of an argument.
